NewsArticle.Title: King Oren's Ball
NewsArticle.Content:
In honor of Aislings for fighting the Pirates of Oren, King Oren will be hosting a Ball. There will be music, dancing, and a buffet. Only Aislings with invitations may attend with a guest. Invitations will be handed out by Rangers. All recognized aislings and aislings currently in office will have first priority for invitations. Aislings that have been arrested may not receive an invitation.
Please download the music files on this site before you attend.
First Ball: Friday, August 30, 4:00pm-6:00pm pst.
Second Ball: To Be Announced
Third Ball: To Be Announced
